title: Jason Momoa makes surprise SNL cameo to outrageously flirt with Kate McKinnon
text:
Jason Momoa made a surprise cameo appearance on SNL last night – to flirt outrageously with Kate McKinnon and flash some earring nipple tassels during a hilarious sketch.

The actor seriously has zero chill in anything he does so when he decides to go comedy, nothing holds him back as he walks into a fake courtroom as Apollo, a nurse accused of stealing from the old lady he looks after.

Swishing his hair and walking in with a seriously extra fur coat (with nothing underneath it, because abs), Jason pleaded his case to judge Chance the Rapper, who was desperately trying to hold it together for the sake of the scene.

Unfortunately for this week’s host, it was only going to get worse from there, as Jason appeared to make it his mission to make the musician crack under the pressure.

Giving Chance some serious ‘come to bed eyes’ to try and win the judge over, Jason tells him: ‘Now listen hombre…I know what you’re thinking…’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Jason then makes a slip up and is seen getting his words twisted, accidentally saying he was a ‘registered parapalegic’ instead of ‘registered paralegal’ before quickly correcting himself as the show aired live across the US.

Just your regular Saturday night for Jason (Picture: NBC)

He then claims that Kate had ‘stolen his heart first’ as she demands the return of her possession from him.

Soon veteran Kate, who was playing the old lady, and Apollo were reminiscing about the times they shared in bed together, before he revealed he’d kept her chandelier earrings and turned them into nipple tassels.

‘You gave me the biggest and best Os of my life, but I still want my money, and my chandalier earrings, they’ve been in my family for generations!’ she declared.

More: Jason Momoa Emilia Clarke reunites with Game of Thrones co-stars Jason Momoa and Kit Harington Jason Momoa leaves Game Of Thrones fans swooning as he runs to greet Emilia Clarke Jason Momoa explains reason behind huge $15 million per episode budget on Apple TV series

Just a standard day in the office for Saturday Night Live, to be honest.

Saturday Night Live airs Saturday nights on NBC in the US, and is later available on YouTube.

description: Jason Momoa made an unexpected appearance on SNL for a hilarious sketch where he admits to randy romance in bid to scam an old lady .
